attributes.action: LIMIT ALL UK BENEFITS UK NATIONALS ONLY
attributes.additional_details:
Benefits need reducing. Nobody should get benefit for more than 2 children. Benefits should not pay for alcohol, tobacco or drugs.
*Reduce the maximum a household can claim
*No cash, vouchers only
*No benefits or Non UK residents. (Including child benefit or children who don't live in the Uk)
*People out of work should do volunteering or have job seekers reduced.
*Work needs to be a better option than benefits.
People are claiming what we let them.
